creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
description: gazing through a courtyard into a rest house: at R, a man returns from his bath; near center, an open door shows a man lounging on his side holding pipe in PR hand as a male and female server each offer trays; at R, another open door exposes three women dressing and finishing their makeup; garden foliage and a stone lantern in foreground at center
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar LRQ; URQ
title: Akasaka,  from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
